description: Marrying salmon and flavour-packed miso, this quick and delicious recipe is easy to whip up for any weeknight dinner.
name: Miso Salmon & Veggie Traybake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Move potato to one side of tray and top with broccolini. Add salmon to other half of tray and bake for a further 12 minutes, spooning reserved miso mixture over salmon in last 5 minutes of cooking or until potato and broccolini are tender. Move vegetables back over entire tray, then arrange salmon on top. Serve scattered with sesame seeds, chilli and onion.
